summary: Iteration 4 testing complete. All 3 bug fixes verified working: 1) Admin panel layout fixed - single sticky header with no overlapping bars, Navigation hidden on /admin, no arc reactor cursor, 2) Aspect ratio field saves and persists correctly when creating/updating projects via API and admin UI, 3) YouTube embed URLs include mute=1 parameter for autoplay compliance.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint (200 OK)
Admin auth with password 'orbya2024' (200 OK)
Admin auth rejects wrong password (401)
Create project with aspectRatio '9:16' - saves correctly
Update project aspectRatio from '16:9' to '1:1' - persists via GET
All aspectRatio options (16:9, 9:16, 1:1, 4:3, 21:9) save correctly
Existing projects have valid aspectRatio field
Projects endpoint returns data
Skills endpoint returns data
Config endpoint hides adminPassword
Quotes endpoint returns data
Stats endpoint returns data
Navigation bar hidden on /admin page (returns null)
Admin panel has 'admin-page' class after login
Admin panel cursor style is 'auto' (not custom arc reactor cursor)
No custom cursor element rendered on admin page
Single sticky header container (no overlapping fixed bars)
'View Site' link present in admin header
Logout button present in admin header
All 8 admin tabs render: Projects, Skills, Media, Stats, Quotes, Config, Colors, Messages
Aspect Ratio select field present in project form with all 5 options
Edit project aspectRatio via admin UI - persists after save
Work page loads with project cards
Video modal opens on project click
YouTube embed URL contains 'autoplay=1'
YouTube embed URL contains 'mute=1' for autoplay compliance
Home page video modal has 'mute=1' parameter
Navigation bar visible on Home page
Navigation bar visible on Work page
Home page renders correctly with HUD elements
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_ prefixed projects for aspectRatio testing, cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 reported bugs are fixed and verified: 1) Admin layout uses single sticky header at lines 1049-1086 in Admin.js, Navigation.js returns null on /admin, 2) Project/ProjectCreate Pydantic models include aspectRatio field, Admin.js form has aspectRatio select, 3) getEmbedUrl() in Work.js and Home.js adds mute=1 to YouTube URLs. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_iteration4_bugs.py with 12 passing tests.

bug_fixes_verified.admin_layout_overlap: VERIFIED - Single sticky header container, no multiple fixed bars, Navigation hidden on /admin, cursor is 'auto'
bug_fixes_verified.aspect_ratio_persistence: VERIFIED - Create project with aspectRatio saves correctly, PUT then GET returns same value, all 5 options work
bug_fixes_verified.youtube_autoplay_mute: VERIFIED - YouTube embed URLs include 'mute=1' parameter: https://www.youtube.com/embed/VIDEO_ID?autoplay=1&mute=1&rel=0
